item.title: Jennifer Love Hewitt - Love Will Show You Everything
item.description:
Today
today I bet my life
You have no idea
what I feel inside
Don’t be afraid
to let it show
For you’ll never know
if you let it hide-
I love you
you love me
Take this gift
and don’t ask why
‘Cause if you
will let me
I’ll take
what scares you
Hold it deep inside
and if you ask me why
I’m with you and
why I’ll never leave-
Love will show you
everything
One day
when youth is
Just a memory-
I know
You’ll be standing
right next to me oh
I love you
you love me
Take this gift
and don’t ask why
‘Cause if you
will let me
I’ll take
what scares you
Hold it deep inside
and if you ask me why
I’m with you and
why I’ll never leave
Oh my love will
show you everything-
Oh- my love will
show you everything
Oh- my love will
show you everything
Our love will show us
everything
